title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3250/83 of 17 November 1983 adjusting the common marketing standards for certain fresh or chilled fish
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3250/83
of 17 November 1983
adjusting the common marketing standards for certain fresh or chilled fish
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The parts in Annex B to Regulation (EEC) No 103/76 relating to haddock and whiting are hereby amended as follows:
1.2.3 //   //   //   //   // Haddock  // Whiting  //  // kg/fish  // kg/fish  //   //   //   // Size 1  // 1 and over  // 0,5 and over  // Size 2  // from 0,57 up to but excluding 1  // from 0,35 up to but excluding 0,5  // Size 3  // from 0,3 up to but excluding 0,57  // from 0,25 up to but excluding 0,35  // Size 4  // from 0,17 up to but excluding 0,3  // from 0,11 up to but excluding 0,25  //   //   //

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1984.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 November 1983.
For the Commission
Giorgios CONTOGEORGIS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 20, 28. 1. 1976, p. 29.
(3) OJ No L 332, 27. 11. 1982, p. 4.
